name: Forest Below
description: Experience the intense tree action in Forest Below as you draw the paths of your tree roots over various turns in order to collect enough water to grow your tree to ever-increasing heights. Developed to satisfy any puzzle fan, this game has controls that are easy to grasp but difficult to master.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirextX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 Driver DirectX: Version 5.2 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirextX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 Driver DirectX: Version 5.2 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
